thread.title: Agricultural Merchants Fully Licensed / Registered

title: Agricultural Merchants Fully Licensed / Registered
text: Location : North Midlands Asking Price : ï¿½2,500,000 This highly reputable and well respected agricultural merchant has been trading successfully throughout the North Midlands region for many many years. During this time the company has positioned itself as a leading supplier of key products and services to the farming industry. The company has grown since inception and consistently generates impressive financial results year in year out. The vendors and their team of staff have many years' experience in the agricultural sector. They have used this knowledge to develop a broad business model which provides customers with exceptional levels of service and delivery, high quality product/service offerings and responsive account management from its premises. The company offers competitive pricing and very good levels of stock. As importantly, now that agriculture is so highly regulated, the company is perceived as a trusted and knowledgeable supplier whom farmers rely on to meet the many legislative requirements they have to adhere to. The business serves customers generally within a 30-40 mile radius of its own location. It has a regular and loyal client base and serves in the region of 800-1000 clients each and every month. Its range of services includes: - Supply of traditional agricultural products, animal health products, dairy hygiene etc. - Contract Spraying/Agronomy Services via its own fleet ( generates approximately one third of current revenues) - Minerals
